quote_last: , he turned to Tom and said, “Hi, I’m Nat Cartwright and…”
quote_raw: At one minute past six, he turned to Tom and said, “Hi, I’m Nat Cartwright and…”
title: Sons of Fortune
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: “No one stops, even to draw breath, until
quote_last: when the last vote will have been cast."
quote_raw: “No one stops, even to draw breath, until one minute past six when the last vote will have been cast."
title: Sons of Fortune
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: . Then three others had managed to get away, making it five altogether. But as the sixth Hurricane was gathering speed for lift-off, a swarm of Messerschmitts had come swooping in over the olive trees.
quote_raw: David had followed me at one minute past six. Then three others had managed to get away, making it five altogether. But as the sixth Hurricane was gathering speed for lift-off, a swarm of Messerschmitts had come swooping in over the olive trees.
title: Going Solo
author: Roald Dahl
